resources.string:
"Robopop V1.0

By Or Zamir and Igor Berendorf
Instructed by Ro'ee Mazor

For the greater food"

"This is how to:
1) Select Microwave Power
2) Place the phone by the microwave
3) Start Microwave
4) Click Start Button
5) Sit back and let it pop!"
"Select High if bag is\nnormally ready in under 3 minutes, otherwise select Low."
